lexUnit.name: spot.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: see, notice, or recognize (someone or something) that is difficult to detect or sought-after.

sentence.text: The Exchange spotted that Barlow Clowes ' accounts were silent on the question of whether its investors ' funds were sufficient to cover what savers were entitled to .
